pages.text: $(major)FTB Industrial Contraptions$() adds several resources to the world. The new ores added are:$(item)$(li)Tin$(li)Lead$(li)Aluminum$(li)Uranium$(li)Iridium$()

pages.title: Rubberwood Trees
pages.text: The mod $(major)Myrtrees$() adds $(item)Rubber Trees$(), which can be used to collect $(item)Latex$() for Rubber.$(br2)If you can't find a Rubber Tree, you can get Rubber from any other Slime Ball.

Place a $(item)Tree Tap$() on Rubberwood Logs, and then place a $(item)Wooden Bucket$() directly below.$(br2)The Bucket will slowly fill with liquid Latex. Right-click to collect 1,000mB as a Latex item. The Bucket can only hold up to 2,000mB.
